data.event: The community was first settled in 1770 and is the oldest community in Summers County.
Lowell was first settled in 1770 by Colonel James Graham; it was the first settlement in what is now Summers County.
In 1777, Lowell was attacked by Indians, who killed three members of Mr. Graham's household and kidnapped his daughter, whom Graham did not recover for eight years.

event.title: did not recover for eight years
